DOC.brief_title: Breast Health Education Underserved Latino Women
DOC.detailed_description: In effort increase early detection breast cancer program design remove common barrier face uninsured Latino woman include lack breast health knowledge inability pay screening . The Levine Cancer Institute offer breast cancer education screen grow Latino population Mecklenburg Union Counties educational program know `` Living Room Visits . '' Living Room Visits educational session host participant 's house lead Carolinas Healthcare System ( CHS ) certify bilingual health educator . At least 250 woman participant educational session county session host 12-15 participant . Of woman participate Living Room Visits , interested individually inform research opportunity provide informed consent ask take pre-test survey . After educational session , subject consent study also complete post-test survey . Three month Living Room Visit , subject also call complete another post-test survey assess educational retention . Phone call post-test survey administer Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative ( CITI ) train CHS certify bilingual employee . Analysis pre post-intervention survey administer CHS statistician use de-identified data .
